dialog: Greetings, good Madam, may I assist you in finding something?
Indeed, I am searching for a camera to purchase.
We have a vast array of choices. Do you have a preference between a point-and-shoot or a more sophisticated one? Might I inquire if you're purchasing this for yourself or someone else?
In truth, I am seeking a camera for my husband.
Ah, in that case, I would recommend a fine entry-level digital SLR.
Might I have a glance at the options available, good Sir?
Of course, follow me. This here is the...
The Canon Eos. It is adequate, however, I am in search of something with improved performance in low light, a finer display panel, and a longer battery life.
Oh, hm, the Nikon D60 is a sound choice.
Yes, but what lens is included in this kit? I do not desire a cumbersome telephoto lens.
Oh, let's see, it appears to come with an 18-55 mm lens. A standard option that should suffice. After all, my husband will not be stalking celebrities or anything of the sort!
So, um, might I tempt you with any accessories...?
Accessories? Do you have polarizing filters available?
Polarizing filters? Let me see... I am afraid we are currently out of stock, good Madam.
Nonsense! There are some right here!
Oh my! It seems we have polarizing filters available after all!
Many thanks for your assistance, Ralph!
It was my pleasure, good Madam.
May I be of service to you, good Madam?
